name: Asociación Ibérica de Limnología
membership: The AIL belongs to the European Federation of Freshwater Scientists
goal: To promote hydrologic and limnologic studies, especially those linked to Iberian freshwaters, including the Balearic, Canarian and Azorean islands.
interests: Climate Action, Education, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Water Framework Directive
Natura 2000 Network
Habitats Directive
Floods Directive
The Groundwater Directive
Environmental Quality Standars Directive
Fish Directive
Regulation on invasive alien species
